sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 10 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Use this when cravings or high-risk moments show up.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### Trigger snapshot
- Trigger or cue: a high-risk situation
- Situation details: ______
- Craving level (0-10): ______
- Thoughts: ______
- Feelings: ______

### Coping plan
- Delay plan (5-10 minutes): ______
- Skill or distraction to try: ______
- Support person to contact: ______

### Protect the next 24 hours
- What I will avoid: ______
- What I will do instead: ______

sections.title: Clinician notes
sections.markdown:
- Draft-only, clinician review required.
- Invite the client to share highlights in session and reinforce skill use.
- Help the client identify early cues and rehearse the delay plan.
- Anchor choices to recovery values and support systems.
